welcome_message_body: Welcome to Braine-le-Comte, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all that this city has to offer. Happy exploring!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth for streaming or large downloads.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
